Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Session.description: The Session resource describes a single connection (session) between a client and a Redfish service instance.
Session.longDescription: This resource shall represent a session for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

ClientOriginIPAddress.description: The IP address of the client that created the session.
ClientOriginIPAddress.longDescription: This property shall contain the IP address of the client that created the session.

CreatedTime.description: The date and time when the session was created.
CreatedTime.longDescription: This property shall contain the date and time when the session was created.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OemSessionType.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM-specific session type that is currently active if SessionType contains `OEM`.

Password.description: The password for this session.  The value is `null` in responses.
Password.longDescription: This property shall contain the password for this session.  The value shall be `null` in responses.

SessionType.longDescription: This property shall represent the type of session that is currently active.

UserName.description: The username for the account for this session.
UserName.longDescription: This property shall contain the username that matches an account recognized by the account service.

enumDescriptions.HostConsole: The host's console, which could be connected through Telnet, SSH, or other protocol.
enumDescriptions.ManagerConsole: The manager's console, which could be connected through Telnet, SSH, SM CLP, or other protocol.
enumDescriptions.OEM: OEM type.  For OEM session types, see the OemSessionType property.
enumDescriptions.WebUI: A non-Redfish web user interface session, such as a graphical interface or another web-based protocol.

title: #Session.v1_4_0.Session
